moc.title: Map of Content
moc.content:
Languages & Frameworks

.NET — ASP.NET Core, EF Core, MediatR
[[csharp/|C#]] — Language features, async, LINQ, performance
Programming Languages — F#, Rust, Go, compilers
Frontend — React, TypeScript, modern CSS

Architecture & Design

Architecture — Clean Architecture, DDD, microservices
Design Patterns — SOLID, CQRS, Event Sourcing
Testing — Unit, integration, E2E, TDD

Infrastructure & Cloud

Infrastructure — Docker, DevOps, AWS
Databases — SQL, NoSQL, query optimization
Messaging — RabbitMQ, Kafka, event-driven
Linux — Shell, Unix, system administration
CLI — Terminal tools, Kitty, Taskfile, Make

Tools & Environment

Dev Tools — IDEs, Rider, VS Code, Nuke, Mermaid
Operating Systems — macOS, Windows
Git — Git, GitLab, branching, CI/CD

Cross-cutting

Security — OWASP, auth, encryption
Performance — Profiling, caching, benchmarking
Observability — Logging, monitoring, tracing
Web — HTTP, REST, GraphQL, WebSockets

Meta

AI — LLM, Claude, prompt engineering
Career — Growth, interviews, system design
Misc — Concepts, psychology, resources
